text: int main ( ) { int t , i , j , c , p , q , f ; long int n , a [ 100000 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } c = 0 ; q = 0 ; f = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] < a [ i + 1 ] ) { c ++ ; p = i ; for ( j = p + 1 ; j < n - 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ j ] < a [ j + 1 ] ) { c = c + 2 ; i ++ ; q ++ ; } else break ; } } } for ( i = 1 ; i <= q - 1 ; i ++ ) { f = f + i ; } printf ( "%d\n" , c + n + f ) ; } }
